Generation VIII.Sword: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn't notice the loss.
Generation VIII.Shield: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.

Generation IX.Scarlet: If it spots a berry tree, it will immediately go to gather berries without a sideways glance—even if it’s in the middle of a battle.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fallen berries by wrapping them in its tail, which is roughly twice the length of its body.

Generation VIII.Sword: Routes 6 , 7 , and 9 , Axew's Eye , Bridge Field , Giant's Cap , Giant's Mirror , Giant's Seat , Hammerlocke Hills , Lake of Outrage , Motostoke Riverbank ( Berry trees ) Bridge Field ( Wanderer ) Bridge Field , Motostoke Riverbank , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
